means: 使陷入（网中）( enmesh的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: All too often they become enmeshed in deadening routines.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们时常陷入枯燥的日常事务之中。

sentence.Network_en: The tiger was enmeshed in the web laid by hunter.
sentence.Network_cn: 老虎缠在猎人布下的网里.

sentence.Network_en: The fishline became enmeshed in roots under the water.
sentence.Network_cn: 钓鱼线给水下的草木根缠住了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The fishline became enmeshed in roots under the water ., 钓鱼线给水下的草木根缠住了.

list.abs: enmesh的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... enmesh 使啮合啮口 be enmeshed in difficulties 陷入困难中 enmesh n.啮口.
Many trade union leaders became enmeshed in the trouble ., 许多工会领导人都被卷入麻烦中.
enmesh 罗网；缠络enmeshing nets 罗网类；缠络类entangle net; flue net; gill net 刺网
enmesh 罗网；缠络enmeshing nets 罗网类；缠络类entangle net; flue net; gill net 刺网
the heart is enmeshed in brimless sadness .心沉浸在无边的忧伤中。

entry.tran: 被缠住的;不得脱身的;陷入…之中的
entry.def: If you are enmeshed in or with something, usually something bad, you are involved in it and cannot easily escape from it.

example.ex: All too often they become enmeshed in deadening routines.
example.tran: 他们时常陷入枯燥的日常事务之中。

example.ex: ...as her life gets enmeshed with Andrew's.
example.tran: 当她的生活和安德鲁的生活纠缠在一起时

means.word_mean: 1. caught as if in a mesh;

auth_sentence.content: She was enmeshed in it in an uncanny way.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was enmeshed in it in an uncanny way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was enmeshed in it in an uncanny way.

auth_sentence.content: Unknowingly enmeshed in a tangle of shady dealings and secret intrigues.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unknowingly enmeshed in a tangle of shady dealings and secret intrigues.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unknowingly enmeshed in a tangle of shady dealings and secret intrigues.

auth_sentence.content: Bottas has had an enmeshed relationship with Williams for several years.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bottas has had an enmeshed relationship with Williams for several years.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bottas has had an enmeshed relationship with Williams for several years.
